articles.title: Team USA basketball: Three things we learned from the Americans' dominant start to the 2023 FIBA World Cup - CBS Sports
articles.description: Team USA cruised through the group stage with a perfect 3-0 record and a plus-103 point differential
articles.content: Team USA made easy work of Jordan on Wednesday, winning 110-62 to complete the group stage of the 2023 FIBA World Cup with a perfect 3-0 record. As expected, the Americans were not tested in the open… [+4953 chars]
